question:
National Mission for Sustainable Agriculture:
  1. was launched during the Twelfth Five Year Plan
  2. is one of the eight Missions outlined under National Action Plan on Climate Change
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
Both are correct statements
National Mission for Sustainable Agriculture is being launched during the Twelfth Five Year Plan. It is one of the eight Missions outlined under National Action Plan on Climate Change (NAPCC). It aims at promoting sustainable agriculture through seventeen deliverables focusing on ten key dimensions of Indian agriculture.
